name: SuperStronger
title: Full-stack developer
description: SuperStronger is an experiment aimed towards helping people counsciously and effectively control their own habits. At the current stage of the project the main goal is to change habits related to weight, such as eating end exercising.
contribution: Developing the back-end using Kotlin and Spring Boot
Implementing OAuth login using Spring Security and the Facebook API
Implementing a group chat application using WebSocket + Stomp
Implementing payment using Barion as backend
Building a basic infrastructure on AWS

name: Yngage
title: Full-stack developer
description: An employee satisfaction survey service specifically targeting the "Y" generation.
contribution: Implementing administrator functionalities for managing surveys
Building a home page based on the client's specifications

name: GE Healthcare Analytics Framework
title: Back-end developer
description: A microservices based application for storing, combining and executing medical algorithms.
contribution: Setting up the service skeletons, prototyping the service-to-service communication using AMQP
Participating in the design and implementation of the algorithm orchestration DSL
